# Overview

This vignette summarizes the PDEs, boundary conditions, and usage examples for the package.

## PDEs

We solve the backward Kolmogorov PDEs under the domestic measure. For 2D European options:

$$
V_t + \tfrac{1}{2}(\sigma_S S)^2 V_{SS} + \tfrac{1}{2}(\sigma_X X)^2 V_{XX} + \rho\,\sigma_S\,\sigma_X\,S X\, V_{SX}
+ (r_f - q - \rho\,\sigma_S\,\sigma_X) S V_S + (r_d - r_f) X V_X - r_d V = 0.
$$

## Examples

```{r eval=FALSE}
library(LocalVolatility)
# Quick constant-vol European 2D price
price <- european_option_2d(100, 20, 2000, 1, 0.05, 0.02, 0.01,
                            0.2, 0.15, 0.3, "call",
                            10, 300, 1, 60, 40, 40, 50, 3)
price
```
